title: arsenstability
author: arsenstability
content: Hi all. I need a developer who integrates a liquidity module for my centralized crypto exchange. Connect in telegram - @arsen_stability

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: arsenstability on July 06, 2022, 07:43:21 PMHi all. I need a developer who integrates a liquidity module for my centralized crypto exchange. Connect in telegram - @arsen_stabilityDo you mean in a CEX or DEX? I this the liquidity module is serves (AMM) for decentralized liquidity and not for centralized platforms.CEXs is database based with cold storage and hot wallet (for despite and withdrawal) that it does not need have liquidated module.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: arsenstability on July 06, 2022, 07:43:21 PMHi all. I need a developer who integrates a liquidity module for my centralized crypto exchange. Connect in telegram - @arsen_stabilityMaybe you want to advertise in this board Â Services. But you have to be very careful specially those who are claiming to be experts, you have to filter out those applications and interview them carefully if they are a perfect fit to what you are looking for. There are many scammers out there, so this is just a warning.
